name: Hotel Petit Palace Las Torres

reviews.title: Right in the middle of it all
reviews.text: This hotel is in an incredible location, right off of Plaza Mayor, and close to everything...sights, shopping, eating, you name it. The hotel is very modest and the rooms are small, but clean. Reception was helpful but did not speak very much English, which was at times difficult. Free internet was a bonus, although, unlike other Petit Palace hotels we have stayed at, there was only one computer.

Right on the Plaza Mayor, this is a great location for the hotel. A bit hard to find by car (Salamanca was much bigger than we expected), we eventually got close enough so my wife and son could find it on foot while I waited in the car.
reviews.title: Great location - Very good room
Horrible
reviews.text: Rooms were average size (we had a triple), but very high-tech (as the name implies) and clean. I gather this is part of a chain throughout Spain, and I'd stay at others based on this experience. In fact, when we got to Madrid later in the trip and I thought we'd have to change hotels I looked for this chain again.

The hotel has nice amenities like in-room Internet (bring own network cable or borrow one from the desk Also have two stand-alone teminals in the hotel), individual reading lamps on the beds, light controls for all room lights from the bed, satellite TV, etc. Strange bathroom door, however, with it being made of translucent glass with the center part transparent. (Is this a new European bathroom trend - we've seen it in two of the three places we've stayed on this trip already?) Anyway, make sure you are good friends with the person you're sharing the room with!
reviews.title: Miniscule corner room, very overpriced, but great location, breakfast selection.

reviews.text: Breakfast was wonderful. Large buffet and (Spanish-language-only) newspapers available and large screen, plasma TV (again, high tech).
reviews.title: Don't you love being woken up at 5am...

reviews.text: Our family stayed in two very nice rooms overlooking the Plaza Mayor. Great vantage to watch the action in the plaza day and night, also a convenient location for walking round town.
reviews.title: Great location and view of Plaza Mayor
In the heart of the action
reviews.text: Once we closed the inner glass doors to the plaza view, and closed the drapes, the plaza noise level was much reduced (not a problem).

description: Petit Palace Las Torres is located in the heart of Salamanca, Plaza Mayor, one of the main tourist and cultural attractions of the city. The Hotel building is in a magnificent baroque- Churrigueresco style building that forms the main facade of the Plaza Mayor, the City Council, and from the balconies of the hotel you can enjoy its majestic view.The hotel has 53 rooms, all equipped with the latest technological innovations and personalized services, it is a perfect choice for your next corporate or leisure travel: There are different types of rooms decorated beautifully according to your preferences (no exterior, XXL, 2 beds, double bed, family rooms with bunk beds, rooms for non-smokers and for smokers), it was completely renovated; all rooms have free access to High Speed Internet (LMDS-2Mb), personal computer with flat 15'' screen, satellite TV, latest generation hydro massage showers, exercise bicycles, etc.. Our hotel has a large lounge where a fantastic and varied breakfast buffet is served, you can taste your breakfast while enjoying the relaxing views of the Plaza Mayor. In addition, this room is ideal for group lunch and dinners. Also there are 2 Business Centers with free internet access (LMDS-2Mb) and personal computers with 15''TFT flat screen in the lobby and in the Social Hall. Located just steps away from the cathedral and the university. You can enjoy the city and the magnificent cuisine of the city enjoying a stroll from the hotel. Your pet is welcome at the hotel. Do not hesitate to contact us if you are travelling with your pet! Everything you need to make your stay the most comfortable experience in a friendly atmosphere! In addition, our concierge staff will be happy to recommend and book the best restaurants, bars and flamenco shows, museums and guided tours within or outside the city for you... Everything you need to make your stay the most comfortable experience in a friendly atmosphere!
